website_summaries.verdict: A convenient, lightweight, compact pressure washer, perfect for smaller cleaning jobs.
pros: Portable, hassle-free design for quick, easy clean-ups
Can be used with any garden hose or to draw water from other sources
Easily switches from cleaning to watering mode
Comes with scrubbing brush, soap bottle, and squeegee
cons: Not as powerful as larger models

customer_reviews.title: Found many uses
customer_reviews.text: Makes tasks i always hated doing more fun and easier and faster. It’s not a gas pressure washer but i knew that and i can barrow one from my dad whenever i need lots of power. Also this kit comes with more than it shows, come with the hose for any water source like bucket, lake....also has the 2 liter or 20 0z connector fitting, carry/storage bag. So description was leaving out some very useful features and tools. I was mixed about it meaning didn’t know if I’d like it but found enough uses for it so keeping it. After ordering another kit as the first got lost in mail.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: The flexibility of using any kind of water source is amazing. Once you own it
customer_reviews.text: This is the go to tool for non-commercial cleanings if you can't fit a power washer. The pressure is sufficient to clean average dirt off vinyl siding, bathroom tiles, cars and more. The flexibility of using any kind of water source is amazing. Once you own it, you will discover so many uses. What I would like to see improved: Either longer battery life (lasts about 30 minutes on average), or faster charge time (about 2 hours). Or both. I would buy this tool again.
customer_reviews.author: YpsiShopper

customer_reviews.title: but sucking from the bucket its an ok buy not super happy about it 2 bucket of 10 gallon of ...
customer_reviews.text: IT is practical and the safe a lot of water Battery quite amazingly survive to wash three cars but do not expect power wash strength, this is only the strength of garden hose (if you live is USA) , means quite strong but I Understand because water inlet are from the bucket, means this has not flowing water into it, but sucking from the bucket its an ok buy not super happy about it 2 bucket of 10 gallon of water enough to wash three cars (Compact car)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shame I didnt listen to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I read the bad reviews and figured it was only due to it not really being a pressure washer and more of a portable water hose. I only needed something to wash the dog piss of my pool deck and the occasional bird turd. Well I was wrong, twice. The water wouldn't come out at all on the first, then the second one they sent had the pressure of a dripping bathroom sink. NO JOKE! I could spit and get the deck more wet. Such a shame as this would've been exactly what I needed had it worked as advertised. Maybe I will try in a year or two after some improvements have been made.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Tried it, love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, this this is awesome. way more power than i expected, and easy. Was a bit more than i wanted to spend, but it was a bit more of a pressure than i expected. Im happy with the trade off. :) Battery seems short life, but charges fast. Then again, ive used it for what i needed 2x on one charge, so thats good. :) if your looking for a slightly more ...oomf. look at the 40v version. (2 -20v batteries) i would have liked it. but still super happy with what i have :)
customer_reviews.author: Giantkin

customer_reviews.title: It Doesn’t Work as Shown on the Commercials
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS NO POWER TO THIS UNIT. We turned this on and it wouldn’t even move a freaking tissue on high speed. It certainly isn’t a power washer of any kind. My husband used a water bottle like they show in the infomercials, and no pressure at all. As far as portable power washers, this one is a wash out and we will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: vegas92(AnyGoodBook)Top Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: This is a truly great tool!
customer_reviews.text: After watching a Worx infomercial on the HydroShot, I was fairly convinced that it was the tool that I needed to clean some decorative cedar siding on my house. This product proved itself to be amazingly efficient. I first sprayed the siding with an oxygen bleach/water solution from a 5 gallon bucket using the draw hose provided with the tool. Then I connected the HydroShot to my garden hose and pressure washed the siding removing the mold-like residue from the cedar. The tool performed better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. Very easy to assemble. Great value and it did a good job. Also like the fact that i could use a 5 gallon bucket to water my plants or wash the car. The pressure was ok however i thought it would of been a lot stronger because of the battery. However it's great for washing the car and cleaning up the fence to remove the mold when i attach it to the garden hose. Not strong enough to removed stubborn oil on concert like an electric. But overall it great for many different thing. It's a great addition to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for spot cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It’s a very good tool for spot cleaning. I ran it for approximately 20 minutes of almost continuous use and the battery still had juice. The soap dispenser is excellent. I filled it with bleach and a touch of dish washing liquid and it worked perfectly, while keeping the bleach from running through the pump. Just remember, it is not a high pressure washer. There is a huge difference between 300 and 3000 psi of pressure. This is more like a soft wash.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Came home, unpacked the item, charge t for 5 hours, connected all the components correctly and this piece of shit doesn't work. not form the draw hose or the bottle cap connector.Very disappointing. First time writing a negative review on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: A BARGAIN ITEM FROM WORKX..........PRECISE AND WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: REALLY ENJOY THE PORTABILITY WITHOUT HAULING AROUND A HOSE AND POWER CORD...EASY TO OPERATE AND TO SET UP EACH TIME AND WORKS WELL....UNDERSTAND THAT IT LACKS REAL PRESSURE SO IT IS NOT A POWERWASHER!
customer_reviews.author: Noel Cowden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in apartment and my neighbor had this power sprayer. It's not as full strength as an actual power sprayer but it's portable enough to keep my porch clean, water my plants on the porch and to fast clean my car from all the pollen and dust.
customer_reviews.author: abscott1703

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the water bottle concept is not so good. Water goes to fast. I had to use two or more 2 lt bottles. As for the putting together to use the 2ltr bottle was kind of tricky. Once you get the hang of it and have a bucket with running water in it like an open fire hydrant with unlimited water the product as the best investment ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More useful than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Was worried this wouldn't get used much but the 5-gal pickup adapter has come in handy vs. dragging hose out and walking back and forth turning water on/off. I use a soap bottle adapter to apply soap and the brush to clean with. I then unscrew the soap container and attach the feed tube for the 5 gal bucket (I put about 3 gals in it of distilled water from grocery store). No water spotting and I don't waste water like I do with regular water hose. Love the squeegee tool as well to clean the delicate Lexan windshield on my new boat - works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rwfapex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Does a great job on built up dirt and green stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to wash our RV..way able to clean all sides, roof and windows. Did a great job getting off the build up from pine trees and other debris.
customer_reviews.author: Dabey C

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work and have missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Last week I tried to set up my unit found that I was missing two parts the 5 in 1 pressure nozzle and showering, with that brass attachment Plus this unit wasn't bringing up the water when I dropped the 20ft hose in the water The battery was fully charged I would like to replace this unit with a other
customer_reviews.author: Delvin Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I was skepitcal at first but now I am amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a power washer that was not big, bulky, need gas,easy to use and did not require an outside spicket. I used it the first time to clean the dirt off the siding on my house. I used a 5 gallon bucket with cleaning solution and water. I went through two buckets and still had power left over. I very impressed with the clean power from a battery operated sprayer I purchase the complete set with all the attachments,. Not use them all yet but I'm sure they will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RCDavester

customer_reviews.title: Good portable unit
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a power washer, this isn't it. It's great for washing your car, exterior windows or watering your plants without dragging around a hose, but it doesn't pressurize water enough to be called a 'power' washer. I'm not disappointed in the unit or the quality. It suits my needs. Keep this in mind and it will suit yours.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: an insult to power washers
customer_reviews.text: to call this a power washer is ridiculous. I've seen super soakers produce more psi. It worked "okay" the first time I used it to wash my car, within a month it didn't have the power to pull any water at all. I didn't register my product within the 30 day window so no warranty for me. Please don't waste your time or money, ignore the good reviews, spend the money and get something that will work. This thing sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Robins

customer_reviews.title: Great for light duty, terrible for anything else....
customer_reviews.text: The WORX Hydroshot is great for light duty clean-up (patio furniture, bicycle, etc.) but it's pretty much worthless for anything else. Even dried bird-poop on a patio chair takes a bit extra work and the "high" (targetted) setting on the Hydroshot. I do think it serves a purpose, though, and it's quite convenient being able to dip the lead line into a pool to clean off nearby patio furniture instead of lugging around a proper pressure-washer, but don't expect it to blow you away with its power.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, arrived exactly as described. Easy to use. Works with hose, works without hose, Great Product, makes spray washing SOOOO much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: sho

customer_reviews.title: Great light to medium jobs
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, works with any portable water source, 5 gallon bucket, or water can, even a 2 liter coke bottle will work. Great for cleaning light to medium jobs. Excellent for car washing. If your expecting it for heavy duty jobs, I don’t recommend this product for you, you will need a gas powered washer for that type of heavy duty work.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Total Dud.  Very little pressure.  ..  waste of time and effort.
customer_reviews.text: This had less power than the regular nozzle I already had on my hose.. It was also difficult to put on the attachment .. I tried for several hours. to make it work I even tried to get through their 800 number.. I read and reread the instructions. ( which were not that great ). Bottom line. this is. just a dud and total waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kpreno

customer_reviews.title: Good auto cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Not real powerful but good enough for washing the car and getting rid of bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bowers

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again....but the 40v
customer_reviews.text: This is a very neat idea/invention and has been VERY useful in certain situations. There’s nothing else like it on the market. If I could do it over, I’d advise going with the 40v though.
customer_reviews.author: YEPowell

customer_reviews.title: Broke on day one
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. The fitting where the hose attaches is plastic and split in two. I dried it and did a fast repair with superglue, but that was not going to hold for long. I had such high hopes, but the quality and performance did not meet my expectations. Its a shame because I really like the weed trimmer from Worx.
customer_reviews.author: BlueMoon

customer_reviews.title: I will stick to my water hose and my Little Big Shot attachment
customer_reviews.text: While it does give a powerful stream on the 0° setting I felt that as the degree of the spray increased the power went down dramatically. The gallons per minute being 0.5 l had better use of a Little Big Shot attachment for my hose. It may be a useful tool if I didn't have any access to a water hose.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: Best value - portable, lightweight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: What DON'T I like about this? Bought for my boat, but quickly started experimenting around the house. Washed my truck, windows, sidewalk...I can't stop using it! So glad I have 2 interchangeable batteries already from my Worx weedwacker!
customer_reviews.author: Baltimoretrash

customer_reviews.title: Worx Good
customer_reviews.text: Use this at my off grid cabin for cleaning the logs. It will knock off a wasps nest from 15 feet away! also is great for cleaning the cemetery markers. One battery pumped 9 gallons of water. Will add the Worx blower and another battery next year.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Don't for the It!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not meet our expectations and just was not as described. We fell into the many commercials seen on this product and thought it just can't be and guess what! This was true! Don't expect too much from it as you will spend hours of frustration trying to get it to clean anything. We returned it. Not recommended.....
customer_reviews.author: Summerhouse

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact that you don't need a hose
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you don't need a hose...Strong enough without one to clean the entire sea wall of my florida house. Here are the before and after shots
customer_reviews.author: Lou Cornacchia

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would have had better pressure on the tap hose then it did
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have had better pressure on the tap hose then it did. I have none batt. opt-rated ones has more power and pressure. But for not have hose hooked up it a little better then I would think after seeing it hooked up to the hose. But better then what I got at the garage no running water, or water at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pontiac1976

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed. I purchased this to wash our vehicles
customer_reviews.text: After putting together, I was very disappointed. I purchased this to wash our vehicles. There was a bird dropping on the side walk so I tried that first. What a joke. My hose with the proper nozzle has more pressure than this product. If your looking for a power washer this is not the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: love the idea of having this product due that I don't have easy access water supply. BUT the idea that I have to wait 5 to 6 hours to fully charge the battery and the power only last 30 minutes its a huge disappointing experience. they should include that in the directions/instruction manual. hated that I completed my job/project in about a week worth time, due to the battery life. now I just use it to water my garden, but for other jobs I am looking else where to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: RigoCess

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product especially living in a apartment complex where ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product especially living in a apartment complex where we don't have access to water to clean off our patio and our cars..... Just wish the battery would last ALOT longer.. I Highly recommend getting two batteries
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: This Hydro is a Joke. Have other WORX  items I like alot. Shame or WORX to put their brand on this!
customer_reviews.text: Does not draw water worth a dam. 320 PSI is more like 20 PSI at best. WORX has given themselves a huge black eye. Battery life was not enough to wash my H3 with one charge. Maybe enough to wash a VW Beetle if you plan it just right and have garden hose handy. I bought this to clean my boat using a 5 gal water bottle but did not work on my H3 in driveway. Would be okay to water plants cause no risk of injuring them with trickle stream gun supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pee stream is harder
customer_reviews.text: Was no way near powerful enough to be useful at all. I did like the portability of the unit but the pressure was beyond low. Like low low.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Battery  life way to short. 15-20 minute's
customer_reviews.text: The battery life of 15-20 minutes is way to short and would not recommend this sprayer to anyone. I returned this one and got a electric powered one for the same price and works beautifully with no problems. Got my bill and still doesn't show my credit for the one I returned, WHY? showed refund on June 11th, but my July statement did not show any refund.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J. Ary

customer_reviews.title: A must-buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Easy to set up easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A Scaldaferri

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to wash loose sand
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. Not only does it NOT have enough power to even superficially wash boat cushions, or deck furniture (due to both lack of power and lack of volume of water), but the battery will run out and leave you stuck with a mess in the middle of trying to get things clean. DON'T FALL FOR THE ADVERTISEMENTS! If I could return this today, I would...but I got sent away to military duty and the time has passed for me to return it. Save yourself the frustration and just buy a real power washer...not this.
customer_reviews.author: DeployedPilot

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t stay charged as long as I would have liked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep the battery charged
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a product that I used to clean driveway surface
customer_reviews.author: terry a. petersen

customer_reviews.title: The unit has indoor uses too.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and noted some were disappointed with the power. I'm happy with the power and use the flower watering mode to rinse off my small dog that I bathe in the bath tub (using the "lake" attachment drawing from a bucket of warm water). I've also had good results cleaning door mats in the bathtub drawing water from the toilet tank. I've tried to clean mold off a sidewalk drawing water from a garden hose with limited success using no cleaner. When the weather turns warmer, I plan to try again drawing water from a bucket using a cleaner as I noticed the garden hose seems to provide more water faster than the unit can use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Garety

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Really like the bottle attachment. Simple to grab and use for quick jobs. I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty cool... Works great for what i need it for... Plus my batteries from the worx weedeater work in it also
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Yes I can was the vinyl siding on my house and also my big rig truck. Wash your deck, etc. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley H Brown

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for what I need it for !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT for what I want to do with it. Just cleaned off the siding on my townhouse and it worked good. Also washed my car,didn't take much water,as filled a large pickle pail I had and was easy to wash. Also cleaned off my patio too. For myself the WORX has enough power for me. Also a great price for all that comes with it. Also bought an extra battery which should come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Roger ( Mn)

customer_reviews.title: Actually DECREASES water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Played with this thing for over an hour. Read instructions, researched online, watched videos, so please don't tell me I'm doing something wrong. Was not expecting a full pressure washer, but was expecting a modest pressure increase.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Think real hard of what you would really need this for.
customer_reviews.text: Is it worth it... No. Battery is short and so purchasing multiple batteries is a must. Does it do what it claims...yes, well sort of. Try lowering your expectstions. Think realy hard what you would use it for. Washing off top surface grim is great, but expect to do extra work to get that top notch clean. Portability is it best quality. It does not claim to do the job of actual powerwasher which is great because at least they are not lying to you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: TAKE ADVANTAGE OF LIKE NEW PRODUCTS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this commercial and was hooked. Waited a while before purchasing because I did my homework. Portability was what I was looking for and did I find it. Brand new, the HydroShot is around $150 for this 20V unit. I got it from the Amazon Warehouse for $104.06 and it came with EVERYTHING plus the Bottle adapter. Going to get the 40V next week.... ALONG WITH SOME BATTERIES!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Antoine D Smith Sr

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved it for what she wanted it for. Remember it is not a big powerful pressure washer but works to clean a car if not by a hose
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stone

customer_reviews.title: A good thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was tired of dragging the big pressure out to do our lanai...It does what I want..yes I would recommend...not a big job pressure washer, but it works good your smaller jobs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great product and portable with use of 2 liter bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great product and portable with use of 2 liter bottles, I did buy some quick connect hose adapters and changed out the worx type, which are not interchangeable
customer_reviews.author: MIKE ROY

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable to be called a pressure washer.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, your house does the job, and if using jus a bucket with soap and water and the attachment provided the pressure is laughable.
customer_reviews.author: ILIana Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is less than stellar.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MACHINE! I've only had it a few months, but I've washed vehicles, my camper, my back deck, and my house with this. The small downside is the fact that the battery lasts 20-25 minutes and takes 5 hours to charge. Because of this, one project takes several days to complete if it's a big project. That's why I gave this four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ragen Darby

customer_reviews.title: Not a "pressure washer" but I don't feel you could blow the paint off of anything which is much safer.
customer_reviews.text: Not a "pressure washer" but I don't feel you could blow the paint off of anything which is much safer. Handy tool for washing the motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use. I only wish the clip was more sturdy and had a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the reach
customer_reviews.text: I love how powerful this is.... and I’m short so I also love how it can reach high up
customer_reviews.author: Shaska Coarteson

customer_reviews.title: Charger Swollen after first use
customer_reviews.text: I got a Like New condition with a warehouse deal, thought it was a kill. After first charge, the transformer part of the charger got swollen and lifted part of the case of itself. Lucky that I spotted that and it did not explode yet. As a warehouse item I cannot return nor replace it. But I will not use it again for safety sake.
customer_reviews.author: samhkhui

customer_reviews.title: Just is amazing, I use this item to clean my bikes ...
customer_reviews.text: Just is amazing, I use this item to clean my bikes and is beautiful and easy to use, I clean with a few water and quickly, is amazing to my use.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great product and perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Has saved me hours of washing windows. Perfect for small jobs and all you need is a bucket of water!
customer_reviews.author: Loml

customer_reviews.title: Defective hydroshot
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the worx hydroshot was defective and I had to return it. It looked pretty cool but didn’t suck up the water into gun.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: There isn't much power and so it took a long time to wash the soap off my car.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job fairly well. There isn't much power and so it took a long time to wash the soap off my car. Still it will be great to have when driving on the salt covered roads in PA during the winter and giving my car a quick bath when I get back to my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: D Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good but not to be a actual pressure washer. Still recommend tho
customer_reviews.text: Not an actual pressure washer. It might be better to use the hose but the brush and soap dispenser work amazing! Like how you can hook a bottle filled with water and go a completely cord and wireless way
customer_reviews.author: Jed Crossman

customer_reviews.title: Need to order extra batteries, with constant use, I get about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Love the portability and ease-of-use, currently using two clean HV AC evaporator and condenser coils oh, sure beats running five to six hundred feet of garden hose!
customer_reviews.author: Howard Dinger

customer_reviews.title: I also tried the soap dispenser - that was worse, the soap came dribbling out
customer_reviews.text: Possibly I had a defective unit. My garden hose has more pressure than this product. I did press the Hi button and the motor sound got louder but the water just seemed to come out at a low pressure. I also tried the soap dispenser - that was worse, the soap came dribbling out. I was hoping to use this to wash my SUV, was sorely disappointed. It might be possible I got a defective unit but do not want to waste any more time using this unit. Usually Worx products are good but this is a total loser.
customer_reviews.author: Oahued

customer_reviews.title: I really love my hydro shot The association of our complex shut ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love my hydro shot The association of our complex shut off our access to our water valves but with my hydro shot I can wash my car anytime I want Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The water pressure is slightly higher than a standard garden hose spray nozzle. The soap dispenser runs out of soap so quickly couldn't even clean the screen on two glass doors before it ran out and hardly cleaned anything off the screens except dust, We tried to water plants but the slow rate of water coming out and the weight of the wand made it much less convenient than just using the garden hose. The battery has to be charged to often to get anything done in a timely manner. Definitely don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Volkmann

customer_reviews.title: ... not tried all the attachments yet but found it easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried all the attachments yet but found it easy to assembly. I did like the spray attachment to clean my car and windows but was disappointed it did not have much power to clean my deck. I was using a lake as my water source. I am hoping when I attach it to my faucet I will get more pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Works great for small jobs, ie., cleaning bird droppings off mail box and car, stains on siding, etc. Recommend buying an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Longstreet

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the house
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly like they said, you don't need your hose, just a bucket, it's no heavy, ready for use in the most common works in the house, great value
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly enough power to accomplish even a simple cleaning task.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Able to wash entire car with no water running down the drain. Battery could last longer. Buy 2.
customer_reviews.author: Russtiffer

customer_reviews.title: Decent needs more pressure
customer_reviews.text: Could use more pressure other than that I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: PK  Tolar

customer_reviews.title: Not a pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I haven’t used it in hose mode, but as it is, works fine. It’s not a pressure washer, so don’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product when I need to clean but do not want to haul out the big power washer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Great for little odds and ends around the house. As long as you don't expect this to be a professional grade high power pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rafter

customer_reviews.title: Just Dont BUY This!!! BEWARE ITS JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. This is like trying to wash a car with a spray bottle. No user error. Just a weak pump with low volume. Many better options than this because it set the bar so low. Save your money. This is not the case of mabey it will work for me. Just Dont BUY This!!! BEWARE ITS JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for small cleaning jobs

product_meta.title: WORX WG629.1 Hydroshot 20V PowerShare 2.0 Ah 320 PSI Cordless Portable Power Cleaner with Accessories
product_meta.description: Style:w/20V Battery, Charger, & Cleaning Kit| Pattern Name:CleanerWhen you want cleaner vehicles, a cleaner outside to your home, just a cleaner life in general, you want this Hydroshot 20V Share Portable Power Cleaner with Accessories bundle. The Soap Dispenser adds soap right into the stream, so you don’t have to mix it into a bucket first. The 7” Cleaning Brush attachment scrubs hard to remove dirt with a low-pressure stream supporting it. And the Hydroshot even does windows with the Squeegee attachment. A 20-ft Draw Hose lets you pull water from the nearest lake, pool, or bucket. And now, with the Bottle Cap Attachment, you can screw on any 2-Litre soda bottle and take your fresh water with you. The 5-in-1 Pressure Nozzle lets you select from 5 different stream intensities: 0, 15, 25, 40 and a watering setting. And the Short Watering Lance lets you keep the plants happy, too. Plus, the Hydroshot is easy to use! It weighs less than 4 lbs with the battery attached, so even though it’s spraying out 320 psi of pressure, almost anyone can control it with just one hand. So much more useful than a hose and nozzle, and so much easier to use than a traditional pressure washer with a tank and bulky hose. The perfectly portable yet powerful Hydroshot. Get one and get cleaning.
feature_bullets: [PORTABLE POWER WASHER] The first truly portable power cleaner that lets you easily and quickly clean all your outdoor spaces and gear
[5X MORE PRESSURE THAN A HOSE] Delivers 320 psi of mean, green, cleaning streams; While minimizing water usage at only .53 gallons per minute
[DRAW WATER FROM ANYWHERE] Attaches to a typical garden hose or draws water from any fresh water source like a pool, lake, or bucket
[2-SPEEDS] Go HI or LO: HI for when your vehicle or deck is really dirty—LO for lighter cleaning to conserve water and battery
[DO IT ALL WITH THE SAME BATTERY] Do it all with Worx PowerShare, the only cordless tool platform that uses the same battery to power 20V and 40V tools
[PORTABLE BOTTLE CONNECTOR] Now you can hook up any 2-Litre bottle with a standard mouth and take your fresh water with you—a completely portable power washer
[PRESSURE NOZZLE] Multiple spray nozzle lets you switch between varying degrees of water stream intensity, so you can switch from cleaning to watering
[ACCESSORIES] Also comes with a Soap Dispenser, Cleaning Brush Attachment, Window Squeegee, 20-Foot Draw Hose, 20V Battery and Charger
